name: chatgpt-intelmac
description: Minimal Electron wrapper that opens chatgpt.com

scripts.dist: npm run build:icon && npm run patch-info && npm run ensure-python && SHIM="$PWD/scripts/.bin/python" && PATH="$PWD/scripts/.bin:$PATH" && PYTHON="$SHIM" && npm_config_python="$SHIM" && electron-builder
scripts.pack: npm run build:icon && npm run patch-info && npm run ensure-python && SHIM="$PWD/scripts/.bin/python" && PATH="$PWD/scripts/.bin:$PATH" && PYTHON="$SHIM" && npm_config_python="$SHIM" && electron-builder --dir
scripts.dist-intel: npm run build:icon && npm run patch-info && npm run ensure-python && SHIM="$PWD/scripts/.bin/python" && PATH="$PWD/scripts/.bin:$PATH" && PYTHON="$SHIM" && npm_config_python="$SHIM" && electron-builder --mac --x64 && npm run rename-intel-artifacts
